Name: Space Leap Tutorial
Desc: Welcome to Space Leap! Reach the finish line within the allotted time to achieve victory.

Name: Space Leap Tutorial
Desc: Press the sprint button to sprint. In sprint mode, your character can leap farther.

Name: Kuroro Coffee - Entrance Introduction
Desc: Start Business: Engage in proxy business operations and complete stages by achieving objectives.\nSignature Mix: Customize your customer list and handle critic assessments to achieve objectives and complete stages.\nHistory Records: Review completed business operation records.

Name: Kuroro Coffee - Rules
Desc: Adjust customer combinations and seating order to earn Likes and boost sales.\nSpend Likes to serve customers and generate more sales.

Name: Kuroro Coffee - Rules
Desc: Customers from your list will appear randomly and cyclically in Signature Mix stages.\nCritics will appear in stages and cause effects. You can adjust your customer list based on the critics' effects.

Name: Lounge Decoration
Desc: Interact with the <color=#0f70bc>Photo Wall</color> or <color=#0f70bc>Display Shelf</color> to enter decoration mode and customize your lounge.

Name: Lounge Decoration
Desc:
On the decoration interface:
· Bottom: View and place owned decorations.
· Right: General operation panel with functions including hide UI, collapse, reset, and save.
· Upper Right: View placement limits for each decoration type, as well as view and save presets.

Name: Lounge Decoration
Desc:
View more decoration information in the <color=#0f70bc>Lounge Codex</color>.
You can obtain photos and decorative items through the following methods:
· Use <color=#0f70bc>Photo</color> to take pictures and upload them to the <color=#0f70bc>Keepsake Album</color>
· Reach specified milestones in <color=#0f70bc>Operation Guide</color>
· Participate in various game modes in Babylonia

Name: Space Leap Tutorial
Desc: The faster you complete a stage, the higher your score. Collect Regular Cogs for bonus points. Reach specified score milestones to obtain corresponding rewards.

Name: Space Leap Tutorial
Desc: If you're not satisfied with your score, you can rechallenge, aim for a higher score, and unlock rewards you haven't obtained yet.

Name: Space Leap Tutorial
Desc: Passing through the acceleration area will increase your Movement Speed.

Name: Space Leap Tutorial
Desc: Touching Disrupted Cogs will deduct points from your score. Avoid them carefully.

Name: Space Leap Tutorial
Desc: You'll jump higher while inside the leap area.

Name: Space Leap Tutorial
Desc: Welcome to Space Leap! Reach the finish line within the allotted time to achieve victory.

Name: Supply Crate Tutorial
Desc: Supply Crates are scattered throughout Babylonia. Find and open them to obtain abundant rewards.

Name: Map
Desc: Open the map to check your location and nearby areas.

Name: Terminal Beacon
Desc: After activating Terminal Beacons, Commandants can use them through the map to fast-travel between different areas.

Name: Business Development Plan - Basic Content
Desc: In the Business Development Plan, Commissioners need to alternate between the <color=#0f70bc>Strategy Phase</color> and <color=#0f70bc>Operation Phase</color> to complete construction of the Commercial Square.\nStrategy Phase: During this phase, Commissioners can build and upgrade stores, and formulate business strategies for retail stores.\nOperation Phase: During this phase, Commissioners need to constantly monitor customer actions and promptly collect customer feedback to adjust business direction in the Strategy Phase.

Name: Business Development Plan - Basic Content
Desc: Each stage requires Commissioners to complete <color=#0f70bc>a certain number of rounds</color> of operation to clear.\nAdditionally, each stage has <color=#0f70bc>3 challenge goals</color>. Completing challenge goals grants extra rewards. Finishing all challenge goals early allows you to <color=#0f70bc>complete the stage early</color> and clock out early!

Name: Business Development Plan - Basic Content
Desc: During operation, customers may sometimes provide <color=#0f70bc>feedback</color> on retail stores, which Commissioners need to <color=#0f70bc>tap to collect</color> in a timely manner.\nAdditionally, some customers may leave <color=#0f70bc>tips</color> at stores they're satisfied with, which also require Commissioners to <color=#0f70bc>tap to obtain</color> them promptly.

Name: Business Development Plan - Inner Ring Stores
Desc:
Commissioners can build one inner ring store per round. Inner ring stores are divided into three types:
1. Retail: Requires Commissioners to formulate business strategies and generate <color=#0f70bc>Income</color>.
2. Traffic: Increases the overall <color=#0f70bc>number of customers</color>.
3. Atmosphere: Boosts the overall <color=#0f70bc>Atmosphere</color>, thereby improving <color=#0f70bc>Satisfaction</color>.

Name: Business Development Plan - Inner Ring Stores
Desc: For retail stores, Commissioners need to adjust <color=#0f70bc>business strategies</color> based on <color=#0f70bc>customer feedback</color> to achieve higher store ratings.\nThe higher the store score, the more customers will come to spend.

Name: Business Development Plan - Inner Ring Stores
Desc: Built inner ring stores can be <color=#0f70bc>upgraded</color> and <color=#0f70bc>demolished</color>.\nThe <color=#0f70bc>upgrade</color> improves the store's <color=#0f70bc>stats</color>, with different stores offering different upgrade options.\nThe <color=#0f70bc>demolition</color> returns the current round's building attempts and <color=#0f70bc>refunds a portion</color> of the Public Funds spent on building and upgrading stores.

Name: Business Development Plan - Outer Ring Stores
Desc: You can choose one outer ring store to <color=#0f70bc>build</color> at 25/40/60/80 <color=#0f70bc>Satisfaction</color> respectively.\nOnce built, outer ring stores will provide <color=#0f70bc>special effects</color> and generate <color=#0f70bc>income</color> when customers make purchases.

Name: Business Development Plan - Outer Ring Stores
Desc: Outer ring stores need <color=#0f70bc>enough customers</color> to make purchases before they can be <color=#0f70bc>upgraded</color>.\nCommissioners can <color=#0f70bc>promote</color> outer ring stores, directing more customers to visit those stores.

Name: Business Development Plan - Outer Ring Stores
Desc: Once built, the outer ring stores will immediately launch a <color=#0f70bc>grand opening promotion</color>.\nEach store will offer two promotional plans for Commissioners to choose from—select based on your current business needs!

Name: Business Development Plan - Outer Ring Stores
Desc:
The Commercial Square holds <color=#0f70bc>regular promotions</color> <color=#0f70bc>every few rounds</color>.
During each regular promotion, each built outer ring store will propose a promotional plan for Commissioners to choose from.
Unlike grand opening promotions, regular promotions usually offer better effects and generate <color=#0f70bc>new trends</color> that change customer preferences for certain retail stores, requiring Commissioners to readjust their store business strategies.
So Commissioner, please select the appropriate promotional plan based on your current business situation!

Name: Business Development Plan - Outer Ring Stores
Desc: Built outer ring stores may encounter <color=#0f70bc>sudden events</color> during operation.\nDuring sudden events, Commissioners need to arbitrate between customer complaints and store response, choosing which side to support. After making a choice, you can also see other Commissioners' choice preferences.\nYou will receive <color=#0f70bc>rewards</color> regardless of which side you choose to support, so make your decision based on your preferences!

Name: Business Development Plan - Marquee
Desc: In the Marquee, Commissioners can select limited-time promotions to launch over the next period. Each promotion comes with a <color=#0f70bc>limited-time mission</color>, and if you can complete the mission <color=#0f70bc>before the promotion ends</color>, you'll receive generous <color=#0f70bc>rewards</color>.
